name: Mexican Hot Dogs with Chipotle Cream
description: These grilled hot dogs are topped with an avocado corn salsa and a Greek yogurt chipotle drizzle!
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon chipotle peppers in adobo sauce (or more to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine corn, red onion cilantro, lime juice and salt. Stir in avocado; set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine corn, red onion cilantro, lime juice and salt. Stir in avocado; set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together Greek yogurt and chipotle peppers; set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, whisk together Greek yogurt and chipotle peppers; set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill to medium high heat. Add hot dogs to the grill and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat grill to medium high heat. Add hot dogs to the grill and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble the hot dogs, add hot dogs into each hot dog bun, top with corn salsa and drizzle chipotle cream on each hot dog.
